name: IMZ International Music + Media Centre
goal: As a global business network for the music + dance film industry, the IMZ International Music + Media Centre is committed to a sustainable advancement of this specialised sector in order to reach + engage new audiences for performing arts. These goals are reflected in all our multi-faceted activities, while our work is based on four main pillars: Market Access + Network, Professionalisation, Audience Development and Innovation.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU cultural policy (European Agenda for Culture, EU Workplan for Culture)
EU cultural funding programmes:
Creative Europe – Culture
Creative Europe MEDIA - Promotion of European Audiovisual Works Online
Creative Innovation Lab, DG Connect
